Package de.edux.augmentation.effects

package de.edux.augmentation.effects
This package contains classes that perform various image augmentation effects. Image augmentation is a technique used to increase the diversity of your training set by applying random transformations such as cropping, padding, and horizontal flipping, among others. These transformations are a form of regularization that helps prevent overfitting and allows your model to generalize better.

The 'effects' subpackage specifically includes classes that implement different kinds of transformations, like resizing, adjusting perspective, and applying elastic distortions to images. Each class extends the 'AbstractAugmentation' class and overrides its 'apply' method to provide the specific functionality.

  • Zugehörige Packages
    Package
    Beschreibung
    de.edux.augmentation.effects.geomentry
    Provides perspective transformation effects that can be applied to images.
  • Klasse
    Beschreibung
    BlurAugmentation
    This class provides an augmentation that applies a Gaussian blur to an image.
    BrightnessAugmentation
    This augmentation technique adjusts an image's brightness value by a specified amount
    ColorEqualizationAugmentation
    This class implements an augmentation that applies color equalization to an image.
    ContrastAugmentation
    This class enhances the contrast of an image.
    CroppingAugmentation
    This class provides an augmentation that crops an image based on a specified factor.
    ElasticTransformationAugmentation
    Applies an elastic transformation to an image, simulating natural distortions.
    FlippingAugmentation
    This class provides an augmentation that randomly flips an image either horizontally or vertically.
    MonochromeAugmentation
    Applies a monochrome filter to the image, converting it to grayscale.
    NoiseInjectionAugmentation
     
    PerspectiveTransformationsAugmentation
    Applies a perspective transformation to an image using affine transformations.
    RandomDeleteAugmentation
    This class provides an augmentation that randomly deletes a portion of the image.
    ResizeAugmentation
    Provides functionality to resize images to a specified width and height.
